column1: '''Haerast''', the '''Far Shore''', referred to the eastern coast of [[Aman]] as seen from [[Nevrast]] across the [[Belegaer]]. Haerast was the opposite of Nevrast, the Hither Shore of [[Beleriand]].<ref>{{S
